pike-stand.description: From a downward-dog shape, walk your feet toward your hands to stack hips over shoulders as much as mobility allows. Hold the inverted V position while pressing the floor away.
tips: Push tall through shoulders; don't sink
Keep legs straight and heels lifted

body-row.description: Under a low bar or sturdy table, hold an overhand grip and keep your body straight like a plank as you pull your chest to the bar, then lower under control.
tips: Keep ribs down and glutes tight
Touch chest to bar each rep if possible

lunge.description: Step forward and lower your back knee toward the floor while keeping the front knee stacked over the ankle. Drive through the front foot to stand.
tips: Keep torso tall and hips square

hollow-body-crunch.description: Lie supine, flatten your lower back to the floor, lift shoulders and legs to create a hollow curve, then perform small controlled crunches without losing the hollow.
tips: Reach long through fingers and toes

incline-push-up.description: Hands on a box/bench, body in a straight line. Lower chest toward the surface and press back to lockout without losing plank tension.
tips: Screw hands into surface to engage lats

active-hang.description: Hang from a pull-up bar with straight arms and engage shoulders by pulling them slightly down and back (scapular depression/retraction). Hold without bending elbows.
tips: Grip the bar evenly and breathe

easy-bridge.description: Lie on your back with knees bent and feet flat. Squeeze glutes to lift hips until knees, hips, and shoulders form a straight line; lower with control.

easy-bridge-raise.description: From the bridge position, perform controlled reps—lift hips to full extension and lower without touching down fully to keep tension.

plank.description: Forearms on floor, body in a straight line from head to heels. Brace the core and glutes, keeping a neutral spine while breathing calmly.
tips: Push floor away; protract shoulder blades
Keep head in line with spine

horse-stance.description: Stand with feet wide and toes slightly out. Sink hips to a half-squat and hold the position with an upright torso.
tips: Keep chest lifted and core braced

band-assist-pull-up.description: With a band looped on the bar and under your knee/foot, pull from a dead hang until chin clears the bar, then lower slowly.

band-assist-dip.description: With a band assisting at the knees or feet, lower on parallel bars until shoulders dip below elbows, then press to lockout.
tips: Slight forward lean for chest focus

step-up.description: Place one foot on a box/step. Drive through the whole foot to stand tall on the box, then lower with control and alternate.
tips: Lean slightly forward to load glute
Avoid pushing off the back leg

single-leg-glute-bridge.description: Lie supine, one foot planted, the other leg extended. Drive the planted heel to lift hips, keeping pelvis level, then lower with control.
tips: Press through heel and squeeze glute

single-leg-glute-bridge-raise.description: Perform controlled reps of the single-leg bridge, lifting and lowering through full hip extension while maintaining pelvic control.
tips: Keep knee of working leg tracking forward

push-up.description: From a high plank, lower chest toward the floor with elbows ~45° to torso, then press back to full extension without losing body line.

jumping-lunge.description: Jump explosively from a lunge and switch legs mid-air, landing softly into the opposite lunge. Maintain torso control throughout.

knee-to-elbow.description: From a plank, drive one knee toward the same-side elbow with control, then return and alternate sides.

knee-to-elbow-plank.description: Hold a strong forearm plank and bring one knee toward the same-side elbow, pausing briefly, then alternate.

arch-up.description: Lying prone, lift chest and legs off the floor by squeezing glutes and upper back, creating an arch through the spine.
tips: Reach long through fingers and toes

hanging-leg-raise.description: Hang from a bar and lift straight legs until hips flex; aim to raise feet to hip height or higher without swinging.
tips: Posteriorly tilt pelvis (tuck) as legs rise

prone-arm-circles.description: Lying prone, lift arms slightly off the floor and make slow controlled circles without shrugging shoulders.
tips: Keep ribs down and glutes lightly engaged
Move from shoulders, not lower back

prone-arm-circle.description: Single-direction/one-arm variation of prone arm circles focusing on scapular control and shoulder endurance.

jumping-squat.description: Squat down and explode upward into a jump, landing softly and immediately moving into the next rep with control.
tips: Load hips and keep chest proud

pike-hold.description: Seated on the floor with legs together and straight, lift heels and feet off the ground while leaning slightly forward, holding a compressed pike.
tips: Lift from hip flexors; lock knees

swimmer.description: Lying prone, lift opposite arm and leg alternately in a fluttering motion while keeping the trunk stable.
tips: Squeeze glutes to protect low back

side-squat.description: Stand wide and sit back into one hip, keeping the other leg straight. Push through the bent leg to return to center.
tips: Foot of bent leg stays flat
Keep chest up and spine long
Feel a stretch on the straight leg

squat.description: With feet shoulder-width, sit the hips down and back while keeping chest lifted and knees tracking over toes. Stand to full extension.
